dialog.speaker: PurplePenguin
dialog.text2: My friends said they'd be here. Did they leave without me?

dialog.speaker: GreenGecko
dialog.text1: Surprise! I was hiding in the sand hehe..

dialog.speaker: PurplePenguin
dialog.text1: Nice try buddy.. I've got nerves of steel.

dialog.speaker: GreenGecko
dialog.text1: You're no fun.. Btw, where's Bear? Wasn't she coming with you?

dialog.speaker: BronzeBear
dialog.text1: NO WAY! THIS NEW APP ALLOWS YOU TO TELEPORT ANYWHERE YOU WANT!

dialog.speaker: PurplePenguin
dialog.text1: LET'S USE IT TO GO TO THE MALL!

dialog.speaker: GreenGecko
dialog.text1: Nah, I say let's use it to head to the surf shop..

dialog.speaker: BronzeBear
dialog.text1: How about we enjoy our time here at the beach.
